revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Relic Castle |image = [[File:Relic Castle.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Relic Castle. |tokens = 166,500 |location = Unova Route D.R. }} '''Relic Castle''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 3,003,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sandshrew || rowspan=3|[[File:Psychic_(female).png|40px]] Psychic Dua || rowspan=3|[[File:Gothita.png|40px]] Gothita |- | [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sandslash |- | [[File:Sandile.png|40px]] Sandile |- | [[File:Baltoy.png|40px]] Baltoy || rowspan=3|[[File:Psychic_(male).png|40px]] Psychic Low || rowspan=3|[[File:Solosis.png|40px]] Solosis |- | [[File:Krokorok.png|40px]] Krokorok |- | [[File:Yamask.png|40px]] Yamask |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Volcarona.png|40px]] Volcarona || <center>21,000,000 || [[File:Psychic_(male).png|40px]] Psychic Perry || [[File:Sigilyph.png|40px]] Sigilyph || <center>16,000,000 |- |}
